description: Stunning visuals and an emotional soundtrack.
The plot is predictable and slow-paced.
Lead actors deliver powerful performances.
Beautiful settings but a weak screenplay.
A film that leaves a lasting impression.
Some scenes are pure cinematic poetry.
Dialogue feels forced in several parts.
An inspiring story with heartfelt moments.
Editing could have been tighter in some scenes.
Music elevates the emotional impact.
Character development is inconsistent.
It tries to be deep but ends up confusing.
Perfect for fans of philosophical drama.
Lacked the suspense I was expecting.
Strong opening but loses momentum halfway.
Visual effects are subtle yet impressive.
Themes of isolation and hope are well explored.
Unrealistic plot twists near the end.
A unique narrative voice with a slow burn.
Cinematography alone makes it worth watching.
